data.message: It's ironic that everyone's knocking Drake for being a pop star when he's standing next to the man who made Love The Way You Lie lmao. One of these guys has a guest spot on Gucci's new album and the other has guest spots on movie soundtracks, I'll let you decide who's actually relevant to the culture in 2016.

replies.message: Haha like Gucci's new album is so important. Eminem wouldn't even send an invite to Gucci to be on his next album!
Leave it to Eminem fans to not understand one of the most influential living rappers' place in hip hop
